sentences.sContent: Most of the criticism has been pretty tame.
sentences.sCn: 评论的大部分内容很乏味。

sentences.sContent: I decided that teaching was too tame for me.
sentences.sCn: 我最终认为教书对我来说太枯燥。

sentences.sContent: The Amazons were believed to have been the first to tame horses.
sentences.sCn: 亚马逊人被认为是最早驯化了马的人。

synos.tran: 驯服的；平淡的；乏味的；顺从的

words.tran: 驯服地，温顺地；没骨气地

trans.tranOther: If someone tames a wild animal or bird, they train it not to be afraid of humans and to do what they say
